This repository is for the plotting figures, essential data and code for ESCRT-III project 
Which is published at : https://journals.aps.org/prl/abstract/10.1103/PhysRevLett.129.268101

In the "Data_and_Figures" folder, there are a number of folders which each contain the figures, plotting script and essential data for each figure. There is a readme in each folder which specifies which code was used for creating the data, with which parameters.


In the "Code" folder is stored the source code for the whole project. There are a number of different versions which are explained in a readme within this foler.
